authentication.comment: Set guestMode to true to test guest authentication instead of profile auth

metadata.comment: metaId will be auto-generated with timestamp to ensure uniqueness

tokens.comment: testTokenSlug will be auto-generated to ensure uniqueness

transfers.comment: Amount to transfer in token transfer test

cleanup.comment: Set enabled to false to disable cleanup operations

_documentation.usage: Use this file to customize integration test configuration
notes: CLI arguments (--url, --cell, --timeout) will override values in this config file
Environment variables KNISHIO_API_URL and KNISHIO_CELL_SLUG will also override config values
Auto-generated fields (metaId, testTokenSlug, secrets) cannot be overridden in config
Server timeout should be set based on network conditions and server response times
Higher retry counts improve reliability but increase test execution time
